metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7350 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Session fixation exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3, as an attacker can fixate his own session cookies to the next logged-in user, thereby hijacking the victim's account. This occurs because a set of multiple cookies (between 3 and 5) is being generated when a user successfully logs in, and these sets overlap for successive logins.

notes.Note: ebarretto> No fix available as of 2019-09-06.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
